title: Insane ping spikes
body:
For a long time I have had this ping problem (Both before and after the NA servers were moved) and havent seen it get any better. I have ping spikes both through the match.  This will cause my ping to go from my normal 30 to 400. This will just randomly stop.  When I am not lagging, I am able to load youtube videos perfectly while playing league with no ping lag. Then there is the opposite where  I could exit out of every program other than league on my computer  only to lower my ping to 250. There is no in between. 

Sidenote: This doesnt happen in any other game, at least not to this extent.

replies.body: Just tried everything in the troubleshooting and nothing seemed to help, I constantly fluxuate between normal and insanely high throughout the game

It sounds like your network is having trouble maintaining a strong connection, and possibly suffering from packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what's going wrong in these matches.  The results will also provide a list of troubleshooting steps specific to your issue.  Let me know if that helps!

Try viewing my post.  Hopefully this helps.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/EuizR9Zc-wifi-lag-spikes-fix

> [{quoted}](name=gustopher89,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JAoxVXRi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-19T04:57:22.577+0000)
>
> Try viewing my post.  Hopefully this helps.
> http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/EuizR9Zc-wifi-lag-spikes-fix

I had already tried disabling interrupt moderation and packet coalescing is not there.
